definition.achievementDescription: You've gatherd your first blazium, an important component in the Potartz Key! Now gather the rest of the components, or get yourself some nice gear!
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="item_in_inventory" x="24" y="23"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">64</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BlaziumOre</field></block></value><next><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false"></block></next></block></xml>
